title: Fireworks Erupt On Capitol Hill (Ep 1417)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the must-see video of the fireworks that erupted on Capitol Hill during the election interference hearing. I also discuss the troubling ways big tech interfered in the 2020 election. 

News Picks:


Pardon everyone!


A summary of yesterday’s election integrity hearing on Capitol Hill.

More shady Hunter Biden emails emerge.

The MAGA world unloads on Mitch McConnell.

More on the influence of George Soros in our political process.


Fed admits it underestimated the power of the Trump economic recovery.
